name: Lesson 1: First Steps with RVCAT
description: A practical lesson to learn the basic concepts of the simulator step by step

steps.title: Welcome to Lesson 1!
steps.description: In this first lesson you'll learn to use RVCAT-WEB from scratch. Let's start by making sure you're on the correct tab.

steps.title: Know the Interface
steps.description: The application is divided into three main areas: Program (top left), Processor (bottom left) and Results (right). Let's start with the program.

steps.title: Processor Area
steps.description: Here you see the processor state: registers, memory and configuration. This is where you'll observe changes during simulation.

steps.title: Results Area
steps.description: In this area simulation results, graphics and analysis are shown according to the active tab.

steps.title: Exercise 1: Select a Program
steps.description: Now let's do the first practical exercise. Find the option to select a program and choose 'v1' to start working.

validation.message: You must select the 'v1' program to continue with the lesson

steps.title: Exercise 2: Configure Architecture
steps.description: Perfect! Now change the processor architecture configuration to 'B2'.

steps.title: Exercise 3: Adjust Configuration
steps.description: Now we'll modify some parameters. Change the ROB (Reorder Buffer) size to 25 .

validation.message: Enter the value 25 in the ROB field

steps.title: Exercise 4: Set Iterations
steps.description: Configure the number of simulation iterations. Enter a value of 500 iterations in the Simulation tab.

validation.message: Enter the value 500 for the number of iterations in the Simulation tab

steps.title: Exercise 5: Run Simulation
steps.description: Now click the 'Run' button to start the simulation with the configured parameters.

steps.title: Congratulations!
steps.description: You have completed Lesson 1! You now know the basic interface and how to configure simulations.
